messages.body: $AAPL http://www.businesstimes.com.sg/technology/berkshire-hathaway-increases-stake-in-apple-by-75-million-shares

links.title: Berkshire Hathaway increases stake in Apple by 75 million shares
links.description: APPLE Inc was not the only one to leap on a chance to buy its stock at a fat discount last quarter as Warren Buffett stepped in to scoop up an additional 75 million shares for Berkshire Hathaway at the same time. Read more at The Business Times.

links.title: Why Indexers Are Toast
links.description: Recently, money management giant BlackRock announced that algorithms would take over a much larger share of the investment decision-making process. The problem is being greatly exacerbated by the recent explosive growth of the ETF industry.
